SEARCH
Package com.smsapp.services.implementations

Class ExamImpl

java.lang.Object
com.smsapp.services.implementations.ExamImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
IExam
public class ExamImpl extends Object implements IExam
Provides implementations for the IExam interface, managing exam-related operations. This class handles the creation, retrieval, updating, and deletion of exam records in the database. It also manages relationships between exams, students, and teachers.

The methods in this class use JDBC to interact with the database. It ensures that the appropriate SQL queries are executed and handles potential SQL exceptions that may occur during database operations.

Typical usage involves creating an instance of this class and invoking its methods to perform operations such as adding a new exam, retrieving exam details by ID, and listing all exams.

Author:
MonigaBalasubramanian

  • Method Details

    • addExam

      public void addExam(Exam exam)
      Adds a new exam to the database.

      This method inserts a new exam record into the database using the details provided in the Exam object. It generates a unique ID for the new exam, which is set in the Exam object upon successful insertion.

      Specified by:
      addExam in interface IExam
      Parameters:
      exam - The Exam object containing the details of the exam to be added. Must not be null.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the provided Exam object is null.
      RuntimeException - If there is an error during database access.

    • getExamById

      public Exam getExamById(int examId) throws ExamNotFoundException
      Retrieves an exam by its ID.

      This method queries the database for an exam with the specified ID. If the exam is found, it returns an Exam object populated with the exam details. The method also retrieves and sets the associated students and teachers for the exam.

      Specified by:
      getExamById in interface IExam
      Parameters:
      examId - The ID of the exam to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Exam object with the specified ID.
      Throws:
      ExamNotFoundException - If no exam is found with the given ID.
      RuntimeException - If there is an error during database access.

    • getAllExams

      public List<Exam> getAllExams()
      Retrieves all exams from the database.

      This method queries the database for all exam records and returns a list of Exam objects. Each Exam object is populated with its details, including associated students and teachers.

      Specified by:
      getAllExams in interface IExam
      Returns:
      A list of all Exam objects.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If there is an error during database access.

    • updateExam

      public void updateExam(Exam exam) throws ExamNotFoundException
      Updates the details of an existing exam.

      This method updates the details of an exam in the database based on the information provided in the Exam object. The exam ID must be set in the Exam object to identify which exam to update.

      Specified by:
      updateExam in interface IExam
      Parameters:
      exam - The Exam object containing the updated details of the exam. Must not be null and must have a valid exam ID.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the provided Exam object is null or if the exam ID is not set.
      RuntimeException - If there is an error during database access.
      ExamNotFoundException - if the exam with the specified ID does not exist

    • deleteExam

      public void deleteExam(int examId) throws ExamNotFoundException
      Deletes an exam by its ID.

      This method deletes the exam record with the specified ID from the database. It also handles any dependencies that might exist between the exam and associated students or teachers.

      Specified by:
      deleteExam in interface IExam
      Parameters:
      examId - The ID of the exam to be deleted.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If there is an error during database access.
      ExamNotFoundException - if no exam with the specified ID is found

    • assignStudentsToExam

      public void assignStudentsToExam(int examId, List<Integer> studentIds) throws ExamNotFoundException
      Assigns a list of students to a specific exam.

      This method assigns students to the exam identified by the specified examId. It starts a transaction to ensure that all operations are performed atomically. The process involves checking if the exam exists, deleting any existing student-exam relationships for the specified exam, and then inserting new student-exam relationships based on the provided list of student IDs.

      If any error occurs during the operation, the transaction is rolled back to maintain data integrity.

      Specified by:
      assignStudentsToExam in interface IExam
      Parameters:
      examId - The ID of the exam to which students are to be assigned.
      studentIds - A list of student IDs to be assigned to the exam. Each ID should correspond to a valid student.
      Throws:
      ExamNotFoundException - If no exam is found with the given examId.
      IllegalArgumentException - If the studentIds list is null or empty.
      RuntimeException - If there is an error during database access or transaction handling.

    • assignTeachersToExam

      public void assignTeachersToExam(int examId, List<Integer> teacherIds) throws ExamNotFoundException
      Assigns a list of teachers to a specific exam.

      This method assigns teachers to the exam identified by the specified examId. It first checks if the exam exists. If the exam exists, it deletes any existing teacher-exam relationships for the specified exam and then inserts new teacher-exam relationships based on the provided list of teacher IDs.

      This method uses a single database connection and handles transactions implicitly. In case of an SQL error, a RuntimeException is thrown.

      Specified by:
      assignTeachersToExam in interface IExam
      Parameters:
      examId - The ID of the exam to which teachers are to be assigned.
      teacherIds - A list of teacher IDs to be assigned to the exam. Each ID should correspond to a valid teacher.
      Throws:
      ExamNotFoundException - If no exam is found with the given examId.
      RuntimeException - If there is an error during database access or handling.

    • getStudentsByExamId

      public List<Student> getStudentsByExamId(int examId)
      Retrieves a list of students associated with a specific exam.

      This method queries the database to find all students who are associated with the specified exam ID and returns a list of Student objects representing these students.

      Specified by:
      getStudentsByExamId in interface IExam
      Parameters:
      examId - The ID of the exam whose associated students are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of Student objects associated with the specified exam.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If there is an error during database access.

    • getTeachersByExamId

      public List<Teacher> getTeachersByExamId(int examId) throws ExamNotFoundException
      Retrieves a list of teachers associated with a specific exam.

      This method queries the database to find all teachers who are associated with the specified exam ID and returns a list of Teacher objects representing these teachers.

      Specified by:
      getTeachersByExamId in interface IExam

    • deleteExamRelations

      public void deleteExamRelations(int examId) throws ExamNotFoundException
      Deletes all relationships associated with a specific exam.

      This method removes all student-exam and teacher-exam associations for the exam identified by the specified examId. It first verifies the existence of the exam. If the exam exists, it proceeds to delete all related records from the database.

      The method uses two separate SQL statements to delete the relationships from the respective tables. The first statement deletes student-exam relations, and the second statement deletes teacher-exam relations. It handles SQL exceptions by printing the stack trace and throwing a RuntimeException with a descriptive message.

      Specified by:
      deleteExamRelations in interface IExam
      Parameters:
      examId - The ID of the exam for which relationships are to be deleted.
      Throws:
      ExamNotFoundException - If no exam is found with the given examId.
      RuntimeException - If there is an error during database access or handling.

    • getExamsByStudentId

      public List<Exam> getExamsByStudentId(int studentId)
      Retrieves a list of exams associated with a specific student.

      This method queries the database to find all exams that are linked to the student identified by the given studentId. It returns a list of Exam objects representing these exams. Each Exam is populated with its ID, name, date, and subject. If the subject retrieved from the database is not valid, it is set to Subject.UNKNOWN.

      The method uses a SQL query to fetch the exam details from the database. It handles SQL exceptions by printing the stack trace and throwing a RuntimeException with a descriptive message.

      Specified by:
      getExamsByStudentId in interface IExam
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student whose exams are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of Exam objects associated with the specified student.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If there is an error during database access or handling.

    • getExamsByDate

      public List<Exam> getExamsByDate(Date examDate)
      Retrieves a list of exams scheduled on a specific date.

      This method queries the database to find all exams that are scheduled on the given examDate. It returns a list of Exam objects representing these exams. Each Exam is populated with its ID, name, date, and subject. If the subject retrieved from the database is not valid, it is set to Subject.UNKNOWN.

      The method uses a SQL query to fetch the exam details from the database. It handles SQL exceptions by printing the stack trace and throwing a RuntimeException with a descriptive message.

      Specified by:
      getExamsByDate in interface IExam
      Parameters:
      examDate - The date of the exams to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of Exam objects scheduled on the specified date.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If there is an error during database access or handling.

    • calculateTotalExamMarksForStudent

      public double calculateTotalExamMarksForStudent(int studentId)
      Calculates the total exam marks for a specific student.

      This method queries the database to retrieve the total marks obtained by the student in all their exams. It aggregates the marks from the result set and returns the total as a double. If there are any errors during database access, a RuntimeException is thrown.

      The method executes a SQL query to fetch the total marks from the database. It iterates through the result set and accumulates the marks into the totalMarks variable.

      Specified by:
      calculateTotalExamMarksForStudent in interface IExam
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student whose total exam marks are to be calculated.
      Returns:
      The total exam marks for the student.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If there is an error during database access or handling.
